{ type: "video", title: "Project 2: Real-Time Streaming with Event Hub & Databricks", preview: true }, { type: "video", title: "CI/CD Deployment for Data Pipelines with Azure DevOps" }, { type: content: { level: "Beginner Level", description: "Apply all skills to build, present, and interview for real jobs", resources: "2 Videos, 1 Audio, 1 Notebook", lectures: [ { type: "video", title: Negotiation" }, ], }, }, ]; const CourseDetailsPage = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("Overview"); const [openIndex, setOpenIndex] = useState(0); // Open first section by default return (
{/* Left Section */}
{/* Hero Image */} {/* Category */} Data Engineering {/* Title */}

Azure Data Engineer Mastery Program (Beginner to Pro)

{/* Course Description */}
{/* Tabs */}
{tabs.map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* Tab Content */} {activeTab === "Overview" && (

Course Description

Break into one of the most in-demand careers in tech with the Azure Data Engineering Masterclass — your gateway to high-paying, future-ready roles in cloud data.Whether you're a fresher, a non-tech professional, or an IT professional stuck in support or testing, this course is designed to help you pivot into cloud data roles with confidence — and land your dream package.

Master Azure Data Factory, SQL, Python, Data Lakes, ETL pipelines, and more with hands-on projects and mentorship. The program is led by Sanjeev Paul, a Senior Manager at Cognizant with 17+ years of experience in Wipro, Infosys, and Tech Mahindra. His guidance will help you build not just skills — but career confidence.

💼 What Makes This Course Powerful?

  • Get job-ready in weeks with real-world projects and live mentorship.

  • Learn tools used by top data teams across the world.

  • Switch from non-tech or low-paying roles to cloud careers offering 10x salary hikes.

  • Craft a profile that recruiters and hiring managers are actively searching for

👥 Who Can Join?

  • Freshers who want to start a solid career in tech.

  • Non-tech professionals from BPO, sales, teaching, banking, etc..

  • IT professionals stuck in testing/support roles seeking better growth.

This isn’t just a course — it's your career transformation path backed by expert mentorship, practical learning, and strong industry alignment.

)} {activeTab === "Curriculum" && (

)} {activeTab === "Instructor" && (

Sanjeev Kumar Paul

Enterprise Data Architect & Career Transformation Mentor

🎓 Certified TOGAF Architect
☁️ AWS Certified Solutions Architect
📝 240+ Trainigs
⭐ Global Exposure

With a strong technical foundation and proven leadership across geographies, Sanjeev is passionate about leveraging cloud and data technologies to solve complex business challenges. With 17+ years of real-world IT experience, Sanjeev Paul isn’t just another trainer—he’s a seasoned expert who has lived and breathed enterprise data engineering across the globe! Having worked with industry giants like Infosys, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, and currently a Senior Manager at Cognizant, Sanjeev brings a powerhouse of knowledge, insights, and industry secrets straight to your screen.

Sanjeev doesn’t just teach—he transforms mindsets. His classes blend deep technical knowledge with real-world use cases, live project exposure, and industry best practices that can launch or accelerate your career in Azure Data Engineering.

If you're a fresher, career switcher, or working professional looking to break into one of the most in-demand tech careers—Sanjeev is the mentor you’ve been waiting for.

)}
{/* What You'll Learn */}

What You Will Learn?

Build real-time ETL pipelines using Azure Data Factory, Data Lake, and Databricks
Master cloud data architecture and confidently navigate the Azure ecosystem
Gain hands-on expertise in SQL, PySpark, and big data processing techniques
Learn to implement CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps for production-grade solutions
Work on real-world projects to create a solid GitHub portfolio employers notice
Prepare for the DP-203 Azure Data Engineer Associate certification with confidence
{/* Requirements */}

Requirements

No Coding or Cloud Background Required
Basic Computer Literacy
Curiosity to Learn New Tech
Laptop with Internet Access
No Prior IT or Cloud Certifications Needed
Commitment to 8 Hours/Week
{/* Sidebar */}

Free

  • Instructor: Daniel Smith
  • Lectures: 23
  • Duration: 2Hr 36Minutes
  • Enrolled: 2k Students
  • Level: Intermediate
  • Language: English
